statements: DELETE FROM medical_literature WHERE id = 1 AND category = 'Journal';
DELETE FROM medicaljson_refl_table WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM medical_literature WHERE authors = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM research_studies WHERE researcher = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM medical_literature WHERE id = 1001 AND publication_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM research_studies WHERE start_date < '2021-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM medical_literature WHERE author = 'Dr. Smith' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM authors WHERE name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM references WHERE article_id = 2 AND author_id = 3;
DELETE FROM journals WHERE journal_name = 'Example Journal';
